Pre-Game Insights: This pitch has one of the best batting pitches ever. Batsmen enjoy the batting on this flat pitch. In the last 9 matches we have seen 5 matches with 300+ scores.
New Zealand team has lost back-to-back 2 matches in this World Cup after a 4 match win against India & Australia.
Rachin Ravindra has scored the second century of this World Cup and scored 406 runs in 6 innings with an 81+ average.
Daryl Mitchell has scored back-to-back fifties and scored 322 runs in just 5 innings with an 80 average.
South African team is looking very good in this World Cup and won 5 out of 6 matches.
South African team has scored three times 380+ scores in this World Cup, showing their batsmen's form.
In the last match, South Africa chased 271 runs against Pakistan on the tough batting pitch Chepauk and won by 1 wicket.
South Africa's 4 batsmen De Kock – 3, Van der Dussen, Klaasen & Markram 1 century, scored 6 centuries in this season.
De Kock scored 431 runs, Markram scored 356 runs & Klaasen scored 300 runs in 6 Innings.
Marco Jansen has scored 143 runs & taken 13 wickets in 6 innings in this World Cup.
Rabada has taken 10 wickets in 5 Innings & Coetzee took 12 wickets in 5 Innings in this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both teams played 71 matches and New Zealand won 25 matches and lost 41 matches against South Africa.
South Africa has won 41 matches and lost 25 matches against New Zealand in ODIs.
